basics.name: Jeffrey Jian
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I am currently interested in data science and video game development. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

work.summary: Managed the front and was part of the kitchen staff. Regularly helped take inventory.
highlights: Maintain day to day activities and restaurant functions
Trained new employees in both clerk and kitchen positions

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
